name: Caffeine Withdrawal
desc: Causes slight sluggishness and occasional cravings.

name: Alcohol Withdrawal
desc: Causes occasional cravings and risk of delirium tremens.

name: Sleeping Pill Dependence
desc: You may find it difficult to sleep without medication.

name: Diazepam Withdrawal
desc: Causes anxiety, nausea, hallucinations, and general malaise.

name: Opiate Withdrawal
desc: Causes depression, physical pain to some degree, frequent cravings and vomiting.

name: Amphetamine Withdrawal
desc: Causes movement rate reduction, depression, immune system weakness and frequent cravings.

name: Mutation Withdrawal
desc: You've gotten a taste for mutating and the chemicals that cause it.  But you can stop, yeah, any time you want.

name: Marloss Longing
desc: You should try some of those pink berries.

name: Marloss Desire
desc: You should try some of those cyan seeds.

name: Marloss Cravings
desc: You should try some of that golden gel.
